main: ^You decide to go on a little fishing trip today to relax.
^With a good catch, you can also earn some money for the family.
^The first thing you need to do is decide on a fishing spot.
^The place in the south has a lot of small fish, you can certainly catch something there, but is it worth it?
^In the north-east next to the railway station there is a pond with very large fish, the only question is whether one will bite.
^Otherwise there is another pond in the west that is quite balanced.
^Where would you like to go fishing?
Sueden: ^You have decided in favour of the more populated south.
Nordosten: ^You have chosen the pond with the big fish in the north-east.
Westen: ^You make your way west to fish there.
Koeder: ^Now it is important to choose the right bait.
^Cheese is a very simple and cheap bait.
^Crickets are a solid bait that can also attract large fish.
^An artificial bait is basically a safe choice. But they come at a price.
Kaese: ^You have opted for the cheap cheese.
Grillen: ^You have decided in favour of the crickets.
Kunstkoeder: ^You have opted for the expensive artificial bait.
Durchgang1: ^You start to attach your lure to the fishing hook and lean back a little.
^You quickly try to reel in the fish. You crank the fishing line...
Win1: ^And that's him! You managed to bring him ashore.
Lose1: ^The fish was able to detach itself from the hook.
Durchgang2: ^You put the next lure on the hook and wait for the next sign that a fish is biting.
^You start to reel in the fishing line.
Lose2: ^But when the line is out of the water, you realise that only an old boot has got caught on the hook.
Durchgang3: ^You want to make one last attempt. You take the last lure and put it on.
Win3: ^You manage to land the fish successfully!
Lose3: ^The fish locks up and pulls on the fishing line.
^You try to hold out against it.
^While trying to retrieve the fish, the line broke.
end: ^You start to pack up your equipment and make your way home.
